plot: Dixie Hardie receives a letter from an old schoolmate, Juanita Dias, extending an invitation to visit the Dias plantation in Cuba. Rumors of war are in the air, hut Dixie insists upon going...
title: The Infamous Don Miguel
plot_es: Dixie Hardie receives a letter from an old schoolmate, Juanita Dias, extending an invitation to visit the Dias plantation in Cuba. Rumors of war are in the air, hut Dixie insists upon going...
